title: Retrocession agreements and documentation
dataVerified: Reinsurer, retrocessionaire, coverage terms, layers, risk details
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Agreement status (active/expired). Link to retrocessionaire system (authorized parties, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents forged retrocession agreements. Domain binding verifies retrocessionaire. Multi-billion dollar risk transfers. Reinsurer capital management. Catastrophe risk layering. International retro market verification.
